Class PgnProperty

java.lang.Object
com.github.bhlangonijr.chesslib.pgn.PgnProperty
public class PgnProperty extends Object
The definition of a Portable Game Notation (PGN) property, also known as tag.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    String
    name
    The name of the PGN property.
    static final String
    UTF8_BOM
    The Byte Order Mark (BOM) that defines a big-endian representation of bytes.
    String
    value
    The value of the PGN property.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PgnProperty()
    Constructs an empty PGN property.
    PgnProperty(String name, String value)
    Constructs an PGN property formed by a tag pair.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    isProperty(String line)
    Checks if the line of text contains a PGN property.
    static PgnProperty
    parsePgnProperty(String line)
    Parses a line of text that contains a PGN property.

  • Method Details

    • isProperty

      public static boolean isProperty(String line)
      Checks if the line of text contains a PGN property.
      Parameters:
      line - the line of text to check
      Returns:
      true if the line is a PGN property

    • parsePgnProperty

      public static PgnProperty parsePgnProperty(String line)
      Parses a line of text that contains a PGN property.
      Parameters:
      line - the line of text that includes the PGN property
      Returns:
      the PGN property extracted from the line of text
